original_text: And when Judah looked back, behold, the battle was before and behind: and they cried unto the Lord, and the priests sounded with the trumpets.
korean_text: 유다 사람이 뒤를 돌아보고 자기 앞 뒤의 적병으로 말미암아 여호와께 부르짖고 제사장들은 나팔을 부니라

sentences.original_text: behold, the battle was before and behind
and they cried unto the Lord
and the priests sounded with the trumpets
